docs.snippet: Gold movements at New York yesterday virtually offset each other, exports of $10,013,600 to France being compensated by imports of $9,663,200 from Argentina, Uruguay and Canada, There were no changes in the stock of gold earmarked for foreign central...
docs.lead_paragraph: Gold movements at New York yesterday virtually offset each other, exports of $10,013,600 to France being compensated by imports of $9,663,200 from Argentina, Uruguay and Canada, There were no changes in the stock of gold earmarked for foreign central banks. As a result the day's net loss of gold was only $350,400.

headline.main: Day's Gold Imports Nearly Offset Exports; British and French Currencies Advance

docs.snippet: Impressive recoveries in foreign bond prices last week, including issues of all shades of credit rating, revived the bond market in general and slowed down the indiscriminate selling that a week or two ago had all but demoralized the markek.

docs.snippet: Another South American republic has sought relief from economic depression by political housecleaning. Paraguay's upset is the seventh in the series of revolutions begun sixteen months ago by Bolivia.
docs.lead_paragraph: Another South American republic has sought relief from economic depression by political housecleaning. Paraguay's upset is the seventh in the series of revolutions begun sixteen months ago by Bolivia.

docs.snippet: Gold to the amount of $19,850,000 was taken from the Federal Reserve Bank for shipment to France yesterday, carrying the total French gold withdrawal from this market since Sept. 21 to $330,943,400.
docs.lead_paragraph: Gold to the amount of $19,850,000 was taken from the Federal Reserve Bank for shipment to France yesterday, carrying the total French gold withdrawal from this market since Sept. 21 to $330,943,400.

headline.main: $19,850,000 IN GOLD SHIPPED TO FRANCE; $9,600,000 Released From Earmark and $2,110,000 Received Cut Day's Loss.DOLLAR HOLDS RECENT GAINSterling and French Francs Unchanged, Lira Off 1 Point--German and Dutch Currencies Up.

docs.snippet: ASUNCION, Paraguay, Oct. 27 (AP).--Provisional President Emiliano Gonzalez Navero formed a new Cabinet today to continue the Liberal party's administration of Paraguay, retaining Foreign Minister Zubizarreta and Minister of Finance Gonzalez.
docs.lead_paragraph: ASUNCION, Paraguay, Oct. 27 (AP).--Provisional President Emiliano Gonzalez Navero formed a new Cabinet today to continue the Liberal party's administration of Paraguay, retaining Foreign Minister Zubizarreta and Minister of Finance Gonzalez.

headline.main: NEW CABINET NAMED AS PARAGUAY CALMS; Army Chief Announces Quelling of Revolt That Forced President to Quit. WASHINGTON IS ANXIOUS Envoys There of Five Neutral Nations Watch to See Effect on Parley Over Dispute With Bolivia. Washington Notified of Change. Five Governments on the Alert.
